sense.def:
Kadar je človek
afraid of someone
ali
afraid to do something
, se boji, ker misli, da se bo zaradi nekoga ali nečesa zgodilo nekaj strašnega.

seg.quote: He was afraid even to turn his head.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
afraid
, da se bo zgodilo kaj neprijetnega, ga skrbi, da se bo tisto zgodilo.

seg.quote: She was afraid that I might be embarrassed.
He was terribly afraid of offending anyone.
Don't be afraid to ask questions.

sense.def:
Če se želimo nekomu opravičiti ali vljudno povedati, da se z njim ne strinjamo, lahko stavek začnemo z izrazom
I'm afraid
.
